IF (f.NEWEST = 0, '否', '是') contract_status, g.ID group_id, g.GROUP_NAME FROM mp_staffcontract f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN mp_company c ON c.Id=f.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item dic ON dic. VALUE = f.CONTRACT_TYPE AND dic.type = 'HTQXLX' LEFT JOIN mp_user u ON u.id = f.modifier_id LEFT JOIN mp_userpost up ON s.ID = up.USER_ID AND up.OFFICE_POST_TYPE = '1' LEFT JOIN mp_post p ON p.ID = up.POST_ID LEFT JOIN mp_group g ON p.GROUP_ID = g.ID WHERE f.del_flag = 0
